title: Kenai Fjords National Park: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       Entrance Fees No entrance fees are charged at Kenai Fjords National Park.      Camping Fees  No camping fees are charged at Kenai Fjords National Park.   There is a 12-site, tent-only campground available at the Exit Glacier Area.         Public Use Cabins Reservations are required for the park's Public Use Cabins.   Coastal Public Use Cabins (summer only): $65 per night Willow Cabin at Exit Glacier (winter only): $50 per night         Commercial and Special Use Fees Filming / Photography for a commercial purpose may require a Special Use Permit and the payment of location fees.           2014 Annual Pass   America the Beautiful: The National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Pass Series   For more information about passes available from the National Park Service and other federal agencies, please see: www.nps.gov/findapark/passes.htm.    No pass is needed at Kenai Fjords National Park.
